孟.definition: first month of a season; eldest amongst brothers

孟加拉人民共和國.pinyin: mèng jiā lā rén mín gòng hé guó
孟加拉人民共和國.definition: People's Republic of Bangladesh (formerly East Pakistan)

孟嘗君.definition: Lord Menchang of Qi, Chancellor of Qi and of Wei during the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)

孟姜女.definition: heroine of Qin dynasty 秦朝 folk tale, who searched for her husband, and whose tears broke down a stretch of the Great Wall to reveal his body

孟婆.definition: (Chinese folk religion) Meng Po, goddess who gives a potion to souls before they are reincarnated, which makes them forget their previous life; (Chinese folk religion) Meng Po, goddess of the wind

孟婆湯.definition: potion given to souls by the goddess Meng Po 孟婆[Meng4po2] before they are reincarnated that makes them forget their previous existence

孟子.definition: Mencius (c. 372-c. 289 BC), Confucian philosopher second only to Confucius; book of the same name, one of the classics of Confucianism

孟州.definition: Mengzhou, county-level city in Jiaozuo 焦作[Jiao1 zuo4], Henan

孟州市.definition: Mengzhou, county-level city in Jiaozuo 焦作[Jiao1 zuo4], Henan

孟思誠.definition: Maeng Saseong (1360-1438), Korean politician of the Goryeo-Joseon transition, famous for his honesty and wisdom

孟村.definition: Mengcun Hui autonomous county in Cangzhou 滄州|沧州[Cang1 zhou1], Hebei

孟村回族自治縣.pinyin: mèng cūn huí zú zì zhì xiàn
孟村回族自治縣.definition: Mengcun Hui Autonomous County in Cangzhou 滄州|沧州[Cang1 zhou1], Hebei

孟村縣.definition: Mengcun Hui autonomous county in Cangzhou 滄州|沧州[Cang1 zhou1], Hebei

孟縣.definition: Meng former county, now Mengzhou city 孟州市[Meng4 zhou1 shi4] in Jiaozuo 焦作[Jiao1 zuo4], Henan

孟良崮.definition: Mt Mengliang in Mengyin county 蒙陰縣|蒙阴县[Meng2 yin1 xian4], Linyi 臨沂|临沂[Lin2 yi2], Shandong

孟良崮戰役.definition: Battle of Mt Mengliang in Shandong of 1947 between the Nationalists and Communists

孟連傣族拉祜族佤族自治縣.pinyin: mèng lián dǎi zú lā hù zú wǎ zú zì zhì xiàn
孟連傣族拉祜族佤族自治縣.definition: Menglian Dai, Lahu and Va autonomous county in Pu'er 普洱[Pu3 er3], Yunnan

孟連縣.definition: Menglian Dai, Lahu and Va autonomous county in Pu'er 普洱[Pu3 er3], Yunnan

孟郊.definition: Meng Jiao (751-814), Tang dynasty essayist and poet
